TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserProfileHelper extends Microsoft.Office.Workflow.Actions.ProfileHelperBase

Docs.summary: Provides a helper class for a object, which gets the user profile information corresponding to the given user.

remarks.para: The type of information varies depending on the schema in the user profile database.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool GetUserProfileBool (Microsoft.SharePoint.WorkflowActions.WorkflowContext context, string schemaName, string propertyName, string user);
.method public static hidebysig bool GetUserProfileBool(class Microsoft.SharePoint.WorkflowActions.WorkflowContext context, string schemaName, string propertyName, string user) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetUserProfileBool (context As WorkflowContext, schemaName As String, propertyName As String, user As String) As Boolean
public: static bool GetUserProfileBool(Microsoft::SharePoint::WorkflowActions::WorkflowContext ^ context, System::String ^ schemaName, System::String ^ propertyName, System::String ^ user);

Docs.param: A workflow context of the activity that is currently being executed.
A string value that represents the name of the schema describing a user profile.
A string value that represents the name of the property in a user profile.
A string value that represents a user of SharePoint.
Docs.summary: Gets a user profile as Boolean type.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value of the user profile corresponding to the given user and the given property.
